category: Herbs that Clear Heat and Purge Fire

action.primary: Clears Heat, purges Fire and dries Dampness

indications: Damp-Heat: diarrhea, coughing with Excess Phlegm, joint inflammation, sore throat, jaundice
Blood Heat: fever, tooth and gum pain, carbuncles, eczema, tuberculosis with hemoptysis

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with Deficiency Cold in the Spleen and Stomach.
